original_text: Being made so much better than the angels, as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they.
korean_text: 그가 천사보다 훨씬 뛰어남은 그들보다 더욱 아름다운 이름을 기업으로 얻으심이니

sentences.original_text: Being made so much better than the angels
as he hath by inheritance obtained
a more excellent name than they
